alert.note: Alert for Delta; Dickinson; Iron; Marquette; Menominee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 5:50AM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Iron, Dickinson, west central Delta, northern Menominee and southwestern Marquette Counties through 615 AM EDT/515 AM CDT/... At 549 AM EDT/449 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near U.S. 141 between Covington and Amasa to near Kingsford. Movement was east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Iron Mountain, Kingsford, Crystal Falls, Norway, Felch, La Branche, Channing, Amasa, Foster City, Witch Lake, Niagara, Sagola, Aurora, Whitney, Waucedah, Alpha, Quinnesec, Ralph, Granite Bluff and Silver Lake near Channing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.
